comment: Yep. In theory we are a collection of separate States that have a few common rules allowing the Federal Government to do only a few things for us like defense (tho we have separate State level National Guard troops at the State Governor's disposal), money,and treaties for trade. Of course over time it has ballooned exceeding Contitutional limits.
